original_text: So on the day of the battle there was neither sword nor spear found in the hand of any of the people with Saul and Jonathan, but Saul and Jonathan his son had them.
korean_text: 싸우는 날에 사울과 요나단과 함께 한 백성의 손에는 칼이나 창이 없고 오직 사울과 그의 아들 요나단에게만 있었더라

sentences.original_text: So on the day of the battle
there was neither sword nor spear found
in the hand of any of the people with Saul and Jonathan
sentences.korean_translation: 사울과 요나단과 함께 있는 백성들의 손에는

sentences.original_text: but Saul and Jonathan his son had them.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사울과 그의 아들 요나단만은 가지고 있었다
